title: (x) Italic serif face with a pesky "w" - Schneidler {Nathanael Bonnell}
content: I am looking for a font, very very close to Poetica Chancery 1 in nature, but the lower-case “w” has 4 upper terminals, similar to the capital “W”. I’m trying to re-create a logo for an client that lost all their digital files. It was suggested by Extensis to give you guys a try so thanks in advance.
author: minnwinger

comments.content: Can you post the logo you are trying to recreate?
Oh, I love Schneidler Italic! It looks like it’s been slightly altered - perhaps redrawn by hand, even?
OH WOW, that is it! Thank you so much! I’m sure it was manipulated somewhat in PhotoShop but I can handle that. Thanks again, what a great resource!
